Description: Rim sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice; cream slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black (fired reddish) below; lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; top of rim glazed; exterior: billet band between lines at rim, reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 442)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 170, no. 44)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0956) (phase 2)
